data.text: This app gets worse with each update. It's easier and faster to just use the website. One example, if you do a search in app, but have to set the phone down for whatever reason... When you go back tk the app it refreshes to the main page and you lose your search results and your place. Filtering is also very hit or miss. What's the point of an app if it's less useful than the website?

The app was always buggy, but overnight there was a major update, and now the app is useless. I have items in my cart from yesterday, but am unable to checkout bc it just keeps spinning and won't load. Same with search. I'm going to uninstall and use my desktop. Also, there has never been a way to find out if an item is in stock at a specific warehouse, and that's the thing we all need.

Love the app but please add a scan & go option like Sam's, and I'd love it even better! 😊 Also, it's annoying that when I look at an item & go back, it doesn't return me to my search results, it takes me all the way back to the beginning & I have to search again. Fix that please.

I believe they made the app purposefully terrible to use to get you into the warehouse. Costco app and website are horrible. Difficult to use. Frequent errors adding items to cart. Out of stock items continually show and you get to cart before it complains with some weird error. I just give up on ordering about half the time. The app resets to home page when your phone screen locks. What a disaster

I don't much understand the purpose of this app if it doesn't allow you to search for products that are in store? Searching for products only shows results that can be delivered, so it's essentially useless for anything that's not an appliance. Like I'm not even asking for it to show me where an item is in the store, I just want to know says your system says you have it. It's just an odd choice. Also please stop the screen from going to maximum brightness when tapping the account button. Pleas

Costco is amazing. App is trash. Could do better. Does not hold a signed in session and still requests extra sign in step when looking at exclusive prices even if user has signed in previously. Does not navigate logically when hitting back, and has no real categorization system. Does not have the ability to search for location of items in a specific warehouse. Has not yet implemented pizza ordering on the app which IMO is their biggest growth opportunity.

Searches do not return items at specific locations - it appears about 75% accurate. I'm not sure why it has you set a location. Having said that, the app is functional and works well for a quick lookup on gas prices, to check ads, and order status'. How to improve. - have more accurate real time inventory. - at the end of the selected store inventory, show similar items at other locations starting with the closest and moving away.

App does not work...at all. I was able to login once. Now I can't login, view products, nor purchase products. This app does a great job of displaying a blank screen with a loading icon. And all this time, I thought the executive level membership provided the highest level of rewards. Silly me.

Attempted to purchase gift cards. The PW reset function is a joke. You're expected to have two devices or the page refreshes. Even if you turn off the bio features it still asks you. Cancelled my gift card ordered twice after charging my card both times, or at least pending outgoing. No particular reason why either. Correct, matching info. Upsetting to say the least.

Update: if I could leave 0 stars I would. The Jan 24 update has somehow made this app worse..... Worst app of all time. The search feature is awful. You can't easily go back and amend your search, either. It takes you back to the home screen and you have to start over. The fact that when you're signed in with your membership card you can't see in club prices, just means that my money goes to Sam's Club instead. I can easily order on their app, for pickup or delivery, and get the member price.

It's hard to say anything bad about Costco, but I'm not loving the January 2024 update to the app. Unresponsive, like tap 6 times unresponsive. The forced notification startup was awful. It always wants me to sign in but then doesn't remember that I have. Receipts randomly available (mostly unavailable). It just seems harder to navigate. The navigation problems may be me since that was a redesign but the unresponsive behavior makes it hard to learn.

The app is subpar and in dire need of an overhaul. It's only possible to see if products are available in-warehouse for small handful of items and the store price isn't shown. It doesn't tell you which aisle products are located at. There's no dark mode. In-warehouse purchase history only shows the receipts instead of a product list for easy viewing and reordering. Performance is lackluster, with most screens taking a long time to load. There's no chat option for customer service.

Please stop the app from turning on 100% screen brightness when simply viewing your account details. It is damaging our eyes trying to read profile and order info! Brightness is only needed when trying to scan your membership card. These need to be separate functions. The app is also confusing. It is now difficult to find the savings booklet so you know what's on sale before going to the store. Still can't find it even though the tour says it's under a 'convenience menu' - what's that??

Cart tends to clear when I'm trying to check out. Then when I add the items again to my cart since it claims it's empty it shows up twice for some items only after I've added them again. But some items completely get erased. Changing the payment option is a nightmare. This app is almost as bad as having to do in-person shopping. Really wish they could fix the bugs already.

Love the store, hate the app. This app is extremely buggy. The whole time I'm navigating the app, it is constantly loading, circling round and round, and telling me there is no internet service even when I'm on strong WiFi. Takes forever to load when I'm trying to research an item. It also kicks me out on a regular basis. I may as well go to the standard desktop site. There's just no point in keeping it on my phone, so I'm going to free up space and uninstall it.

Update from 2022 review: Still glitchy, won't let you go back to previous page at random times. The search function will sometimes work. I'll be signed in but it will tell me I need to sign in to see the price. While reading through reviews it will automatically scroll the page back to the top review. The redesign doesn't fix these issues that existed for years.

Terrible app. Luckily the in person shopping experience doesn't match trying to use this awful app. You can literally know exactly what you are looking for and the search feature says nothing matches. The layout is confusing and the app provides almost no usable functionality. Trying to shop with it is a nightmare and borders on unusable as it can't find half the items you buy there in person. Ridiculously bad app.

Multiple issues: 1. The back button on the phone exists the app, it is very annoying. I never saw this issue in any other app. 2. On clicking the Account tab, the phone's brightness is automatically increased to a maximum it irritates the eyes. If there was a reason to do so, then there should be an option provided to the users to disable/enable as they like. Why are you forcing it on them? 3. Items are difficult to find. Search doesn't work properly.

This app needs a lot of work. There are some things that work nicely, such as posting fuel prices and pulling up my membership information. Many things are missing. There's no scanning for prices, no locator for items, and not even a list of in-store items that are specific to a selected warehouse. The app needs to match the caliber of the company.

Stores are great. App is trash. It says turn on location access? I say yes. It then freezes while trying to get me to select a warehouse. ...which is why locations on. I'd zero star it if I could, it is 2024 apps are everywhere figure yours out, it's probably better for ratings and business if you do.

I can't even order one item smoothly, although my phone is not that old. I added an item to my cart and hit on checkout. It removes the item from my cart and won't redirect me to the checkout page. When I finally got to the checkout page, it didn't process my order, and I had to hit the submit order a couple of times to get it processed. This isn't the first time happening. Unbelievably low quality app from costco

Utterly useless. Used to at least load up. Now I can't even select a warehouse. Want to see how an app should work? Look at Sam's app. That is awesome. Can scan as I walk around, check out and walk out without waiting in line at all. Most importantly, it will actually start up! What a novel idea! I love Costco, but you desperately need a new app development team.

One of the worst apps ive ever used. Has lots of bugs that haven't been fixed with any updates. Will sign you out a lot of times when you leave the app. Will randomly refresh and put you on a different page. Will also randomly empty your cart. Very frustrating and they seem to have abandoned the app because nothing has ever been fixed and you can see from the reviews

Why can't customers see the ingredients of several grocery items with the app? App does provide the package pictures but the ingredients are illegible and you can't even zoom in to see what it says. Can you imagine trying to order groceries online and having food allergies? Like really Costco. You're better than that. I'm a college dropout and even i can fix this simple issue with minimal costs. (Better picture of nutrition facts and ingredients or actual type it into product descriptions) easy

I'm sorry, Costco, but I'm on board with everyone else. The new app is not user-friendly at all. The sales flyer is nowhere to be found and the "Costco Direct" is front and center for items that are one-time purchases. Why would you not put items your customers purchase daily/weekly front and center? As a side note, Sam's and BJs both have scan and go options on the app. This would definitely help with lines in the warehouse.

The app does most of the things you'd expect it to. However, one glaring omission is the scanning and payment feature that the Sam's Club has. This feature allows you to scan each item you are purchasing and then pay for these items, all from the app, skipping the line. At the exit, the checker could look at a summary screen to confirm the items in their cart. Otherwise, this is a nice app.

Love Costco but not this app. Ads, ads, and more ads. Its use is limited. Suitable for online shopping and delivery, it does not provide warehouse inventory and warehouse prices. Also, it doesn't provide aisle location of products for shopping in warehouse. It would be a great app if it scanned and facilitated checkout. Why go to the selfscan checkout? Thinking about uninstalling it.

Costco should be ashamed of this app. The inability to effectively search, purchase & review products makes the app mostly useless & very frustrating. I love, LOVE, Costco - but I have to be honest & would never recommend this app. Costco should take some pointers from Sam's Club in terms of app design! Hard to believe the current version has gone through a major overhaul to improve functionality because it's still one of the worst shopping experiences of any retail app.

1/6/24 Congratulations Costco, you really broke the app this time. Slower than ever with a spinning circle. Pathetic This app has been broken for quite some time now even after many supposed bug fixes. Most times I try to search using a keyword such as a brand name the page just spins momentarily and just stays on the homepage. Hire a developer that actually knows what they are doing.

Poor experience using the app. I'm logged in with my address and all. Tells me delivering to the ZIP where the store is. I update the ZIP, it takes then reverts back to the store ZIP when I browse an item. It tells me it can't figure out the availability and to update the ZIP code. And you want me to buy stuff off here? Nah, I don't trust the app, too many errors in it.

Poor exchange between the app and having to log in when member price only shows. It takes to another site to log in then if it does go back the page is not found. Have to start over each time. Make the app I have login and don't hide prices! Tried many times to write reviews it says something went wrong try again later. Also, asks for member ID when trying to post which it should auto fill. If I switch apps to find it and go back, poof all the writing I did is gone. I am not wasting time again.

The things I hate: There are different products between the normal search and the same day search despite having the same store selected. The app has different prices vs in store. Special deal cuepon codes are not automatically applied to your purchase. Many items are a good price but most products are cheaper elsewhere. The last but isn't about the app but about the store... Parking lot is full. Check out lines are to the back of the store. There's line to get out of the building.

Oh it says can't connect to the internet when pulling up sales. Account tab is super bright no matter what. Always losing place in the sales list when you navigate to look at an item. Claims there's a new app but when I try to update it it gives me an error. I'm sure there's more I just can't remember right now.

Sends too many toast notifications that don't even work. When it says "hey here's a thing on sale you should check out!" I click on it and just takes me to a blank page with an error. Then it randomly tells me my membership expired. I don't get the point of this app - the prices and inventory don't even match the store.

Update hasn't fixed anything, can't add supposed warehouse only deal to shopping list, only to one day delivery cart, which isn't even supported in my area. Recent updates degrading experience. Home page is way too busy. Difficult to find in-warehouse deals. Often button to add to shopping list is missing or isn't functional or adds to shopping cart instead. Did an ADHD tween take over development of this app?

Love Costco, hate the app. Search navigation is clunky. The app doesn't tell you whether the one thing you need is at a particular store or even available in stores at all and it definitely doesn't show you things that are in the stores and not sold online. I'm not going to hold my breath for a scan and go function, which would make my life so much easier, but at least being able to tell that I can get something I need at a particular store would be really helpful. Sam's wins this round.

This app is absolutely horrible. It can't tell me if it carries items I want or not in the store I picked. They could probably learn a thing or two from Walmart. I tried searching broccoli, for example, the app couldn't tell me if it's available in store or anything. It's really irritating. I'd rather not drive 45 minutes just to find they don't have something when Walmart can tell me they have it. I love Costco, but I don't love the minimal effort. Do better, please.

It's a very poorly constructed app. With absolutely useless search functionality. It's so poorly constructed that I could not find even the most simple of searches. I've even tried searching by product code from a receipt. Just try putting together a simple grocery list. There are no review replies from the developers, and the email address referenced is no longer in service. So it's doubtful that they even review these reviews.

For a market cap of $300 billion, it should be painfully embarrassing how terrible this app functions. The app is slow, pages crash, and when I go to view my cart after adding items, it shows me the page cannot be displayed. This doesn't have to be the Amazon app with all the bells and whistles, but you should at least be able to reliably shop for items, add them to your cart, and finish the purchase. I assume the app is bad because they want us to go in store, but not all of us have that luxury

This used to be an easy to use app for grocery delivery. They changed it recently and it absolutely sucks! Can't figure things out, everything takes way more clicks, you keep going around in circles! Whoever designed the "upgrade" needs to be fired ASAP !!! You can even click on the picture of the item to zoom in anymore. So, you can't zoom in to check ingredients! Useless app! I have to go find the item online to be able to see ingredients 🤦 Why? Costco! Why??

I love shopping in store. This app, however, is just awful. If you want to see what is in stock at your local Costco, or price compare... you just can't. Every other big box store I can think of has these features, so Costco is way behind on that front. The other features on the Costco app are similarly user-unfriendly. I hope they fix it! I would definitely be utilizing/shopping their app/store more if they did!

Ok, so I just got my membership and am learning the app. I see that some are frustrated as hell about how to change its location. Yes, it's super frustrating, but if you go to the bottom of the screen, there is the warehouse option icon, and click on that, and you can change it in there. And it does stay. Hope thus will help out others using this app.

The Costco app is a disappointment on many levels. I expected more from a company as big as Costco. I can't plan a grocery shopping trip, like I do with just about any other store that sells groceries: BJ's, Stop & Shop, Target, Walmart. I can't see my local store inventory to see if items I need are in stock or check the price. I can't do curbside pickup. I really expect more from my (Executive) membership. A total revamp of the app & website is long overdue.

App works fine for browsing. Placing orders needs work. I placed an order for a very expensive item and didn't want it delivered to my house when I was not there to receive it. I selected ship to store so I could pick it up when convenient. While processing the order, the app changed it back to ship to home. Called customer service and they could not change the shipping method. Better off placing order through the website using a computer.

This app is kind of terrible. The search function doesn't actually work and like many other places in the app, it just opens what is essentially a webpage to perform the search and leads to almost no information anyways. I imagine it'll get better but for now actually finding information in the app about specific locations is basically impossible. I have way more luck just calling which is fine but I should be able to get that info through the app.

Great company! Mediocre app at best. Quirky at times - for example, 2 items in my cart, I click on the cart icon to view or complete my order and a new page opens with a Teddy bear declaring "Page Not Found!" What? Quit/force stopped the app and restarted - same message. Guess I'll have to wait to buy something? Empty the cart and re-enter items? Not ready for prime time. Use you web browser instead.

If I could give this app 0 stars I would. To describe what I had to go through just to add my Costco Citi card to my digital membership is a joke.. and involved having to update my call settings on my phone as well as the call settings on my watch so that I could answer through my watch and use the dial pad on my watch without my phone screen switching over to the phone app cause it kept cancelling out the verification screen to start over and I didn't have a text option. So. Glitchy and slow.

The app works well most of the time, but it displays the wrong location set as my warehouse, and you can not change it in the app. It can only be changed using a browser. I've reset it several times, but each time it goes back to the one it thinks it should be my warehouse. Very frustrating. It's like Costco tried to save $ and just had warehouse personnel develop it in the back of a warehouse. The only thing really useful about this app, is the card scan feature.

Worse than before Latest version is a major downgrade. Where are the sales flyers? On the Explore tab, but an icon at the top. Gone is the Menu page showing everything. To get to Travel, you have to go to the Shop page for some reason. Your shopping list? Go to Accounts and scroll down a bit. And the list shuts down every time you switch apps, or the screen locks, or yo even rotate the damn screen by accident! And it's 2 more taps to open it again. What was wrong with the previous version?

I do not like the update to same day shopping. I would like to be able to see the nutritional facts and be able to enlarge the photos on the items. Also, when you go back, it reloads the whole page, and you have to find your way back to where you were in the scroll of items. The feed itself looks clean but super annoying when having to scroll back to where you were. Also, not about the app so much, but the fact that all items are marked up a few dollars each is icky. I could go on..but not space

I am posting this in hopes that this feedback makes it to the development team. Overall, it's a decent app, but it is currently busted on a Google Pixel fold. The app works fine on the outer screen, but as soon as you open it, the app gets in a loop trying to resize the window and the whole screen blinks swapping between different sizes. I hope this can be fixed shortly. The app doesn't need to be optimized, it just needs to work like any other non-optimized app on the larger tablet screen.

Horrible! Super glitchy, it takes forever for pages to load (using great Wi-Fi), then it goes blank for no reason. Cart disappears on a regular basis and you have to redo all your shopping all over again. They don't show things on the app that you know for sure they have at the store, which is very annoying. I only use it when I really have to, and because the closest Costco is 50 min from my house...

The app has everything Costco sells but it's crazy slow in my experience. It will also be inconsistent with the items I place in my cart if I leave them for more than a day or two, the items disappear. Checking out has been a hassle too because of the speed of the app as well as resetting each time there's a loading error. At the end of the day, I get the products I want without leaving my house, but the app could definitely be improved.

This app is broken and not user friendly. The search never works for items I know are stocked at the location selected. It always says for everything "we were not able to find a match." Another aspect of the search that is really annoying is when you hit back, it doesn't take you back to the search bar, but the "shop" tab. It just feels clunky when you need to search more than one thing.

App has a lot of bugs lately. It will randomly ask me to sign in over and over. It loads very slow, even navigating pages. I checked for the tire promo and for some reason every time I have opened the app since, it starts at the tire promo page. I've navigated to several pages other than the tire promo page since. Perhaps we need a rollback to the previous version. It is the holiday season and I'm looking for deals. But the app is becoming annoying enough that I may stop using until it is fixed.

Constantly changes my home warehouse to one that's three times further than the one I had selected, and takes the stars and moon to be perfectly aligned to get it changed back. Other warehouse information is superimposed on the "set as warehouse" button, so as many times as you try to press it, it does absolutely nothing unless you have a pinpoint stylus. Been this way for YEARS - please fix!! And PLEASE join the 21st century and update the app so you can see availability of items in warehouse!!

The app is absolutely ridiculous. It has "my warehouse " set almost 100 miles away and will not let me change it. The "set my warehouse " icon is overlapped with the next selection. Very frustrating. Some functions are just not working period. I've heard many people complain about this. Sam's club is so much better! They have a "scan & go", curbside pick up available and I can choose sunshine else to pick up my order with ID. More convenient for disabled customers at Sam's club.

The app is painfully slow and it constantly logs me out. Back button sometimes takes me back to the front page, sometimes it does nothing at all, other times it takes me to the previous page like you'd expect. I'm trying to purchase something through the app and it won't let me change my credit card. It keeps defaulting to a long expired card, and when I change it, the checkout screen refreshes and the expired card is back. I don't know how they expect people to use this thing.

App works ok for the most part. Forget any kind of multitasking while using this app on your phone because as soon as you focus on a different app and come back to the Costco one, it completely resets anything you were looking at previously. Goodluck trying to change your password on the same device. You will need a separate device in order to do so because of the mentioned issue. Gave 3 stars because it's really annoying and unintuitive.

does a great job of identifying whatever I may be looking for. I have not utilized all parts of the app yet, so will have to provide an update later on. there seems to be one snafu where if I click away from the app, and then go back to it, the screen is often blank (does not refresh with the same information). I then have to go back to search for said item a second time to get back where I was. More of an inconvenience than a a deal breaker.

This is one, if not, the worst app in existence. If I switch yo a different app, the app's state gets reset for no reason. Each navigation to a screen takes forever to complete. Absolute travesty in engineering and effort from such a big conglomerate. That's what happens when you try hosting a webview in an app instead of hosting a native experience. Skimping on basic necessity.

The high rating on this app comes from the experience and reputation of the Waterhouse. This app is not the worst but it's embarrassingly near the bottom. Frequently, my account is completely unconnected so everything is "access denied". Then you unnecessarily raise the brightness to full on the account screen. Product photos are slow to load and hard to zoom. Tried to verify membership and you're thrown into a loop. It shows no reviews on the list but multiple reviews inside the product page...

Worst app ever. Half the time it works and most times it doesn't work properly. If I search something specific it just refreshes the same front UI over and over. When I need to check order status it loops to the sign in page over and over. I don't understand how in this day and age a company making billions of dollars a year can't have a functioning app. Doesn't even show if items can be found in store?!?! I wish there was a Sam's club near me, way less busy, crowded and their app works.

This app is useless. It automatically selected a home warehouse over 100 miles away. There is an option to change the home warehouse but the text for the location ovelaps the button to change it so you can't select it. Since I can't change the home warehouse. If I want to buy online and pick up at the warehouse. I can't do that unless I want to drive 100 miles to my "home warehouse" instead of the one that is 3 miles away. Also when sorting items by price it does not actually sort them by price.

Probably the worst app ever. Can't set my warehouse. The app always chooses "My Warehouse" for me. Sometimes it choose one in Texas, today it's Seattle. For the record, I live in Michigan. Always have. I can find my store, but the app is layed out in such a way that all the store info is overlapping, making the "set my warehouse" button unselectable. It's so annoying. But, it never seems to get fixed. Because of this, I can NEVER see what's in stock in my store. This app is completely pointless.

The app never remembers my saved warehouse and delivery ZIP code. Every week, I have to re-set it because the app changed it to whatever location it thinks I'm at, and worse, it's never based on my actual phone location but on whatever it thinks my WiFi location is. Another thing that consistently happens consistently is that I'm logged into the app and use the app's Card feature to enter the store, but when I open it again to check out, it logs me out, forcing me to pull out my actual card.

I love Costco and have been going there for over 20 years. This is more of a heads up to Costco that this app is terrible. I can't change my store. It's stuck on one warehouse 60 miles away from my zip code. You try and change warehouse and the text is laid over each and unselectable. The app also crashes constantly when trying to view products. Try to pinch & zoom a product image it crashes. I had to use the app to show my member card at cash register yesterday, and the QR code didnt work.

Search function is horrible. 9 out of 10 times I can't find my item. What's typically displayed is "We were not able to find a match. Try another search or shop related products." Hard to find sales on items Costco carries regularly as well as new items. Sounds intentional to get you to visit store. Not sure how much longer I need it installed but barely use it and when I do it's essentially useless.

App is horribly slow, locks up, kicks you to random screens, never reliably accepts input data on important screens during ordering... like making a tire purchase, I got booted off and entirely lost the ability to make an appointment. And the stupidest feature ever - putting your phone on full brightness anytime you enter the account screen!!! This should only happen when viewing your card, not during the entire account screen which has tons of links. I love Costco but this app is embarrassing!!

Recent app updates have made it so I can no longer zoom product images when shopping for same day orders. That means I can no longer read ingredients on food items. Costco does not provide detailed product information in same day shopping. Thus, the ability to zoom images to read information is really essential. This is especially important for those of us who need to avoid specific ingredients in foods, supplements, or personal care products. Please change it back to zoomable images!

Quite possibly the worst shopping app in the play store. Worst I've experienced. Doesn't support authentication. Shopping cart is inaccessible. Location service and changing warehouse location is hit or miss. No use downloading this app if you expect to use it regularly. It took three associates to navigate through the app with me during member sign up in the store. They also complained about the app reliability issues. Frustratingly horrible.

Forgot I reviewed this. It's become more useful through the years, but has returned to frequent login problems for the pharmacy. Keeps going to the login page, no matter how much it says successfully logged in. Not impressed that the fingerprint login basically just fills in the password page and still has that step. I still miss the photo centers, this app was great to pick up a fast photo (as a parent, when I need a photo printed, it's usually for a school project and I need it now).

It WAS a decent app but, search feature has gone missing and you must go through page after page ad nauseum to find what you could have found by just entering what you're looking for, no longer possible on my galaxy S23 Ultra! Sam's Club does not have this problem and is hands down a much better app! They could and should take a page from Sam's book .

Useless for Same-Day Delivery on Android phones/tablets. Stopped allowing me to expand/magnify product pics. The app never puts "details" under the "DETAILS," so there's NO product info, e.g., ingredients, nutrition, or lists of items in sets. I'm surprised the software designers bother to list prices or quantity/count of items included. I can't shop in the warehouse due to transportation issues, so I depend on delivery. But not for Costco's Same-Day Mystery Products! SMART & FINAL, HERE I COME!

Filter option only works for category but not for anything else. Ex: in appliances you can select category refrigerators (works because it's a link). But if you try to select a brand/color (checkboxes), there is no apply button, only a clear all button. X'ing out doesn't apply. So there is no way to filter, you have to weed through everything which is annoying. Asks me every time to enable fingerprint, never actually does. No way to get back to home page after sign in, have to reboot the app

For a long time, the Costco application has been simple, but effective. A recent update has made the application so glitchy and unreliable that I have gone back to Samsung Pay and the physical Citi bank card for payments and store access. Problems have included randomly logging out, the inability to pay on self-checkout terminals and the fingerprint login not being consistent.

Uninstalling because the search function doesn't work. I search up a product and i don't even get a "sorry, we couldn't find that" i get 3 pages of ads for unrelated sales of products i do not want. I'm not even sure it actually searched anything up! Being able to have a digital copy of my card was useful when i forgot it at home ONCE, but honestly, having a shopping app that doesn't let me actually shop it not worth the space it takes up on my phone anymore.

Needs Scan & Go. I just left Sams to join Costco. I almost exclusively used the Scan & Go feature to check out and never had to wait in the checkout line. Incredibly convenient for the customer AND the receipt checker at the exit. Otherwise the app is fine. Not great, fine. Hire some more engineers to do some technological updates to bring it into 2024. Thanks

Needs a better update that will actually fix the issues. It won't let me change my home store. I signed up in my city but it's stuck on a city 2.5 hours from me so it doesn't show me anything available in my store, only stuff from the further city to ship to my house. There's a serious glitch on the screen to change the home store. Everything is overlapped so I can't click on my home store to change it. Therefore, this app has been completely useless for at least 2 years and still counting.

The app logs me out all the time. I have to reset my password each time because it says it is wrong. Half the time this causes me to be stuck in a loop for 5-10 reset attempts. I've even given up and had to get a temporary pass for the store... back to carrying my card. It also changes my location to 100s of miles from where I am. So disappointed!

The app is BAD. Not sure how this app made it to production. 1. Very slow to respond to anything. 2. Search function barely works. 3. Layout is super unintuitive. 4. Every time you go to accounts tab, it goes into super SUN mode and tries to burn your eyes. 5. Even though I'm logged in, won't let me see my purchase history or anything else from the accounts tab. 6. Major bugs in pretty much every function.

I used to love this app. But some annoying behaviors have appeared. Because they are basic behaviors, it's very annoying and disappointed that they didn't get fixed - return action doesn't return to the previous screen - cannot set the "My Warehouse" because in the list of warehouses, they overlap each other thus obscuring the select button

Terrible app! For one it is painfully slow, but my biggest beef with it is the inability to filter. Sure there is a filter button filled with all the fields you need to weed out the stuff you don't want to scroll through, but if you take the time to enter all the fields you're looking for there is no way to enter the fields after so you just go back to where you were. There are so many other issues but just like they couldn't be bothered making a working app, I can't be bothered typing it all!

App is pretty basic and you can't expect to find everything in a timely manner. I'm a member of Sam's club also and there app is so much more advanced, the scan and go feature is a game changer. Not having to load then unload to scan reload then unload again in the car for the privilege of talking to one of your "friendly" cashier's is nice.

App receipt for online purchases doesn't show amount you actually paid. I get a notification from my bank showing a charge for Costco, so I check the Costco app receipt section to see what it is that finally shipped. But the receipt doesn't show the price paid for the items. It shows the original price with all the discounts totalled in the detail section. So I have to wait for all items to ship before I can go back and total the charges and make sure it matches my bank account.

App is buggy during ordering. The worst possible time for it to flake out is when you're placing a big order and you're not sure if it went through and when you hit place order it shows you a screen that says page not found. Then you do it a couple more times and finally have to go to the web page on a PC to see how many times you placed the same order. Luckily this time only once, still it should not have happened. However I do LOVE Costco. Their customer support is absolutely top notch.

for the most, it's a good app. I don't like that I can only select one filter item at a time. it also gets glitchy during checkout. it will say it can't process but doesn't say why. So, I have to go through each item to figure out what the issue might be...address doesn't match, something with billing info, etc

Trying to renew my membership and continue to receive error after error stating "my payment method is out of compliance with the contract chosen ". Tried multiple cards types, tried enabling and disabled renewal options, modifying storage of my payment method, and reread the agreement term and conditions for something i was doing wrong or not accepting, but nothing works. In addition, the app won't take an update of my billing address, so I have to re-enter it every time I received an error.

App isn't updated to what items they all have in store like the Sam's Club app nor allows for pickup order, nor fill up on gas like the competitors app. I also had to go in store 4 times to set up my ecard. God forbid the app let me do this myself or just do it automatically. Also, shipping is added to the price of every item, so you can't see what price it actually is in store so no comparing to prices elsewhere. There's no extra convenience I can find to the app conpared to using the website.

So useless I'm not even sure where to start. - tried to find the price of an item in the store. Can't scan the barcode and search returns nothing. - tried to add my Costco Anywhere card to my digital membership, can't and the error. message was a vague 'can't do that right now' message. - No scan and go like Sam's Club. It also regularly hangs and I have to fully close and reopen it (which often resets my Home Store).

Of all the grocery store apps I use this one is the worst. It's like Costco hasn't updated this app since 2015. There's too much to list here - kicks you out, says it's not connected to the internet, can't open/enlarge picture, doesn't have product details listed half the time, it's just...primitive. Costco is awesome, I've gone for years and years but please rehire app developers.

Screen Brightness Override!?!? Costco, could you allow the phone user to control the screen brightness when presenting the "digital membership"? I was looking at the app on my phone late at night updating my account information. When I accidentally pressed on digital membership. The phone screen went from the settings that I specifically have on "extra dim" "eye comfort" and the screen brightness to the lowest possible setting to your auto-enabled feature of all settings on ultra bright.

Used to work on my Pixel 6. now trying to install it on Pixel 7 and it keeps thinking i am in the US, not Canada. So the app basically doesn't work for me anymore, it really shouldn't be that hard to make it work to login with the appropriate info. Also defaults to Seattle for my home Costco and Can't make it change to a Canadian one. EDIT Never mind, I found it, you have to change the country in regional settings, honestly, that's just bad UX design.

I live 93 miles away from Costco and Sam's Club. I pay for memberships at both places. I want to plan out my purchases in both places and can't because Costco's app doesn't show current warehouse inventory and pricing. It only shows what's available to be delivered via instacart which is of no use to me. As it sits, this app is nothing more than a digital wallet for your membership number.

The app keeps logging me out at the worst times. One time, I was on the checkout line, and when it was finally my turn, I tried to show my membership. At that moment, the app logged me out. Worse, there was no internet signal with TMobile at that spot, which rendered the entire app useless. I had to leave the line, find a spot with cell signal, log back in, and try to pay again. Needless to say, I really don't like this aop.

the app is generally pretty good. I have two primary issues, one is that it is hard to figure out if the item you are looking for is in stock at your preferred store or another nearby store, and the app doesn't automatically sign me into my account, so I don't see member pricing without looking at my profile first. other than those two issues, the app is great.

Costco seriously ruined the app! It's not at all user-friend and difficult to find where things are located in the app. I wish they would go back to the way it used to be a few months or more back. I hate it and try to avoid using it if I can. Also, why can't they put the member only savings on the app at least a few days before its effective, not that I could find it. I usually go shopping the day it starts but like to "clip" the coupons as a reminder of what I want but can't do that.

Poorly coded app - cannot select preferred location because menu options overlap each other. Uninstalled / reinstalled didn't help. In addition, the web portal has my location preference correct. Since I log onto both the app and web portal with same credentials, that should transfer. I get that the app follows your physical location and it still picks the farther location in the area.

This app might be the only reason I don't keep my membership and I've only had it for a month. The app shouldn't go back to start if I go to type in a search bar. Same Day shouldn't be in a subportion if the app that VANISHES if I hit go to search for something TO BUY SAME DAY. Correcting an order after it's been placed is more difficult than making the order in the first place, which still took an hour with the app glitching. I don't even like Sam's Club but their app is at least functional.

I like that Costco has an app, but it certainly needs lots of improvements. I tried searching for eggs, but it gave me dog food and other egg products. If I have the Costco app open, then go to another app and come back Costco it erases what I was looking at and takes me to the shop tab. It's very annoying. Also, it has no barcode scanner or scan & go option like Sam's club does. I am very disappointed with this app.
